rules: Use these links and steps as the source of truth for customer replies.
If a user is not logged in, explain they must create an account first.
Always provide the most direct link and the next step to complete the task.

topics.title: Affiliate Program
topics.summary: To become an affiliate, the user must create an account, submit an application, and wait for approval before using the portal.

topics.title: Sign in or create account
topics.summary: Sign in at the main login page. New users should use the sign-up mode.

topics.title: Password reset
topics.summary: If a user forgot their password, start at the forgot password page and follow the email link.

topics.title: Support and help
topics.summary: Support chat is available on the homepage and inside the app. The main support page, help page, and FAQ are available below.
